statements: DELETE FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE failure_prediction = TRUE;
DELETE FROM EquipmentFailurePrediction WHERE failure_prediction = FALSE;
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' AND maintenance_cost < 500
DELETE FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Annual Inspection' AND equipment_id = 50;
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND technician_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND technician_id = 5;
